name: Translucent Image
description: For the first 2 sec of Fade, you take <dynamic>5 - 15</dynamic>% less damage.

name: Move with Grace
description: Levitate grants <dynamic>20 - 35</dynamic>% increased movement speed.

name: Clear Mind
description: Dispel Magic, Purify, and Mass Dispel cost <dynamic>20 - 35</dynamic>% less mana.

name: Charitable Soul
description: Casting Power Word: Shield on an ally also shields you for <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% of the amount for 10 sec.

name: Light's Inspiration
description: Desperate Prayer heals you for an additional <dynamic>10 - 40</dynamic>% of your maximum health over 5 sec.

name: Power Unto Others
description: Casting Power Infusion on an ally reduces its cooldown by <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic> sec.

name: Shining Radiance
description: Power Word: Radiance healing is increased by <dynamic>10 - 40</dynamic>%.

name: Pain Transformation
description: Pain Suppression also heals your target for <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% of their maximum health.

name: Exaltation
description: Rapture's duration is increased by 2 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic> %.

name: Lasting Spirit
description: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased 5 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>%.

name: Swift Penitence
description: The damage or healing of your first bolt of Penance is increased by <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic> %.

name: Focused Mending
description: Prayer of Mending's first target is healed by an additional <dynamic>15 - 37.5</dynamic> %.

name: Resonant Words
description: Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Heal or Flash Heal by <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>%.

name: Mental Recovery
description: After Psychic Scream ends, affected targets' movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>40 - 70</dynamic>% for 5 sec.

name: Courageous Ascension
description: Ascended Blast deals an additional <dynamic>20 - 50</dynamic>% damage, and Ascended Eruption deals an additional 1% damage per stack of Boon of the Ascended.

name: Festering Transfusion
description: Unholy Transfusion's duration is increased by 5 sec and deals <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% more damage and healing.

name: Blessing of Plenty
description: Fae Blessings affects 2 additional spells, and enhanced casts of Power Word: Shield, Shadow Mend, or Void Bolt have a <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic>% chance to reduce Fae Blessings's cooldown by 5 sec.

name: Shattered Perceptions
description: Mindgames lasts an additional 15 sec and deals an additional <dynamic>15 - 26.25</dynamic>% damage or healing.

name: Shimmering Apparitions
description: When your Shadow Word: Pain deals non-critical damage, you have a  <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>% chance to create a Shadowy Apparition.

name: Mind Devourer
description: Mind Blast deals an additional <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>% damage and has a 10% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no insanity.

name: Rabid Shadows
description: Shadowfiend attack speed is increased by 20%, and it deals <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% more damage.

name: Dissonant Echoes
description: Void Bolt has a <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>% chance to reset the cooldown on Void Bolt.

name: Holy Oration
description: Spells that reduce the cooldowns of your Holy Words reduce them by <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>% more.
